trans-unit.source: The RecipientInfoEnumerator class provides enumeration functionality for the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: De klasse RecipientInfoEnumerator biedt functionaliteit voor de opsomming van de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> verzameling.

trans-unit.source: The Current property retrieves the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: De huidige eigenschap haalt de huidige <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> object uit de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> verzameling.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object that represents the current recipient information structure in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> -object met de huidige ontvangersinformatie structuur in de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> verzameling.

trans-unit.source: The MoveNext method advances the enumeration to the next <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: De methode MoveNext de opsomming verplaatst naar de volgende <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> object in de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> verzameling.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a bool that specifies whether the enumeration successfully advanced.
trans-unit.target: Deze methode retourneert een Boole-waarde die aangeeft of de opsomming is voortgezet.

trans-unit.source: If the enumeration successfully moved to the next <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Als de opsomming is verplaatst naar de volgende <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> object, de methode retourneert <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the enumeration moved past the last item in the enumeration, it returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Als de opsomming het laatste item in de opsomming gepasseerd, retourneert <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Reset method resets the enumeration to the first <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: De methode opnieuw instellen van de opsomming herstelt u de eerste <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> object in de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> verzameling.

trans-unit.source: The IEnumerator.Current property retrieves the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: De eigenschap IEnumerator.Current haalt de huidige <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> object uit de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> verzameling.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"></xref> object that represents the current recipient information structure in the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: Een <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfo"> </xref> -object met de huidige ontvangersinformatie structuur in de <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.RecipientInfoCollection"> </xref> verzameling.
